channel.title: Random events

item.title: Random events
item.dc:creator: @luka2005 luka2005
item.description:
@luka2005 wrote:

No need for Randoms coming up while your walking around In a rsps The main reason why you would want randoms is for High alchers, thieving, and Simple Skills that make you money.

What i suggest is making an Experience counter, when you gain X amount of experience the counter resets and a random event shows up.

X Can vary anywhere from 50,000 experience - 500,000 experience(Randomly Chosen) (Just an example) So that way it actually will be Random, and it will stop most Macroing on a rsps.

a good idea for a random event is this, Make someone come to you and attempt to speak with you, when you speak with him he says

“Type this code (Random code)” Example: Apple, Dog, (Name of server), Chair, etc anything Simple for someone to easily remember
“Click here to continue”

When you click it brings you to an option to write what was asked for

Kinda like an Authentication, Very simple and effective for the most part. Unless you want to create a runescape like Random event, which personally i find it useless, for the fact of random events are “Role-played” I don’t think anyone on RSPS role-plays. And it also matters on, if you want it to look fancy for people to see, or if you just want it to get the job done.

I personally think having random events is a great idea, especially for Big servers. I wouldn’t suggest you make it teleport people away, Unless you bring them back to the same spot after the Event is over. Prizes would be good if Event completed, not something big but genie lamps, Random amount of Sharks, Super strength potions etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Random events
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:33, topic:509128”][quote author=Cyberus link=topic=627371.msg4263876#msg4263876 date=1363746929]
packets 3, 45, 86, 241

edit: i probably should of explained.

3: sent every time the clients focus changes
45: sent every 40 mouse clicks, only if the client is flagged on login
86: sent every 20 camera movements (?)
241: sent every mouse click
[/quote]
Thank you very much[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Random events
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:34, topic:509128”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=627371.msg4264278#msg4264278 date=1363820422]

No randoms if in combat btw.

Not true, I got a random event when I was in combat (with a guard in varrock) yesterday. I got the ‘shade’ random who tried to kill me.
[/quote]
Really? That seems a bit stupid to me, I’d have thought that they’d prevent it.[/quote]
I’d think that you’d only get ones that teleport you away.

Read full topic

item.title: Random events
item.dc:creator: @Cyberus Cyberus
item.description:
@Cyberus wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:29, topic:509128”][quote author=Lin link=topic=627371.msg4263902#msg4263902 date=1363751603]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=627371.msg4263897#msg4263897 date=1363750977]

[quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=627371.msg4263893#msg4263893 date=1363750318]

[quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=627371.msg4263890#msg4263890 date=1363749469]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=627371.msg4263886#msg4263886 date=1363747931]

[ul][li]Randoms only when skilling[/li][/ul]

EDIT: What would you guys think about custom random events? I have a few ideas in mind :o
[/quote]Wrong. You can get random events from just walking. They are RANDOM events, they occur in skilling because EXP gained makes them appear more often. And yes, adding your own custom random events would be very cool. I can help you with ideas

I meant solely for rsps though. It’d be kinda pointless to send random events when walking.
[/quote]well not entirely, people bot flax and stuff and gain no exp while doing it.
[/quote]Why wouldn’t random events just be random?
[/quote]Uh, I’m pretty sure they would only pop up when the user performed an action of any type with the world.
[/quote]Really? I remember walking and Genie’s would pop out of no where.[/quote]
yes, it’s assumed that these packets are used for random events. you click when you walk.

Read full topic

item.title: Random events
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

eyeownyew:

I got a lovein evil chicken in OSR while doing the grand tree demon boss. So yes ransoms in combat though they’re annoyingas he’ll so you might not want to add them.

Were you safespotting it? Jagex doesn’t consider you in combat until you get hit back. But before their removal you could get grabbed even if you were getting hit back

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:25, topic:509128”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=627371.msg4263922#msg4263922 date=1363753197]

So randoms only aren’t triggered when in combat and minigames?
[/quote]Combat yes, minigames no.

Even combat with a player…? That’d be pretty irritating.

Yea the last few months of randoms, you could get pulled from combat. It was to stop people from sitting in AFK combat for 8+ hrs at a time[/quote]
Like mimes, drill instructor, sandwich lady, evil twin lady, school random, gift, genie.
